channel.title: [REQUEST] PK SkillCape [REQUEST]
channel.description:
I have been looking for 2 days straight for this skill cape. I've seen what i want but i dont want wings on it just a regular PK SkillCape I have also seen ones with just .mqo files and im too dang noobish to make them .gz I would really love it if someone could make me that skillcape with the .GZ file and the INT I don't have photographic memory (like most of you) but i think it kinda looked like the hunter cape. The skill can be anything but i really need that cape =P If you are making it from scratch i prefer you do just recolor a skillcape base because i want it to have a skillcape base =P Thank you for reading (and assasin creed fan, i don't care if you don't want recolors sorry)
(And BTW, who ever made the black and gold money cape I LOVE YOU)

if(i == 19008) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [3]; class8.anInt174 = 12048; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 600; class8.anInt198 = 1000; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 12048; //Male class8.anInt200 = 12048; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Pk Cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Cape Smithed together by the most skilled Pkers.".getBytes(); }
